website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Harmony Adapter for PlayStation 3 isn't completely painless (or cheap), but once up and running, it does provide total control over your PS3 including the ability to power it on and off.
pros: Provides complete control of PlayStation 3 including all 51 possible commands
Allows for powering on and off
cons: Harmony programming isn't as simple as directions make it out to be
Won't work with remotes other than Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully.  Wish it was cheaper though.
customer_reviews.text: I already bought a PS3 Bluetooth remote to replace the non-intuitive PS3 controller. Unfortunately, it became just another remote in my ever-expanding collection of remotes. I ended up buying a Logitech Harmony 650 to put an end to the hassle of juggling so many remotes. Since the 650 doesn't have bluetooth I had to buy this adapter to get the pesky PS3 under my rule. The adapter works great and it's as easy to set us as the other devices. My only complaint is that it's kind of expensive. It's 50% more expensive than the PS3 remote. I deducted a star due to lack of value. Otherwise, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Well to Adapt Harmony Remote to PS3
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. Easy to connect to PS3. Harmony will control the PS3 fine if you just put the PS3 into the Harmony configuration "used" as appropriate (for example, PS3 for games, PS3 for DVD...) I find the PS3 can take a while to respond, particularly to turning off. Depending on the Harmony remote, the interface to the PS3 buttons is different, I have a Harmony 1000, and it allows a simple switch between the {circle, triangle, X, square} buttons, and DVD-type {start/stop, pause, FF, rew...}. The other Harmony I have is an 880, and it has fixed buttons for DVD-type controls, with the PS3 buttons on the menu.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thaxton

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw away until you read this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost six years without any problems but recently I have had problems with intermittent power loss. I wasn't about to pay a c-note for a new unit so I did some research and found a new power source sold by Amazon. Logitech power adapter for less then 10 bucks. Has been working perfectly for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Phez RN

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy this?
customer_reviews.text: OK, I've had my PS3 for over 6 years and a Harmony remote for almost that long. For all those years, I always said I didn't need this for the price they were asking ($70). Our old Harmony 880 died and we picked up the new Harmony Touch and I got to thinking about the adapter again. For the price, I decided to go for it. Now I'm asking myself why the heck did I wait so long. I'm back to a single remote and love it. There is a slight lag from when you press a button to the action on the screen ( IR to Bluetooth) of maybe a half second, but you quickly adapt.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Monica Yielding

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy to have my system up and running
customer_reviews.text: An expensive little gadget that does exactly what is needed to make the PlayStation usable with the Logitech controller. I'm so happy to have my system up and running, but I do wish the price had been a little bit more reasonable. Oh well, so far so good and the little expensive gadget is working perfectly with our PS3 and our controller.
customer_reviews.author: Wen H

customer_reviews.title: Missing some features
customer_reviews.text: Miss leading description that it has all controls, none of the joystick functions are there. I got this after a old version IR USB remote i used to programmed my harmony remote. Its a good controller and was really easy to setup. But missing some key features. The joystick controls isnt there, which the description said all functions would be there. This causes problems on browsing some websites like pandora. You cannot get to the play/pause or forward buttons at all. I talked with Logitech support and they dont have a solution for this. Also you will see multiple clicks so you need to take your hand of the remote controller buttons fast. Noticed this mostly on netfix movie controller.
customer_reviews.author: Drewex

customer_reviews.title: Allows my Harmony remote to control my PS3 as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This little box allows my Logitech Harmony 880 to control my Bluetooth-based Playstation3 and means one less ON button I have to press on the PS3 controller. The Harmony remote can now perform almost all of the non-gaming functions of the PS3 controller, so I don't need a controller unless I actually want to play a game. (I should explain that I use my PS3 more for Netflix and Amazon Video streaming than gaming these days).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Watson

customer_reviews.title: It works -- but isn't as responsive as a geniune PS3 remote
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded my Harmony 890 to a touch-screen Harmony 1100 remote. I also wanted to replace my Sony PS3 bluetooth remote with this adapter so everything can be controlled by the 1100. Unfortunately, the speed and response of the Harmony 1100 and the PS3 adapter feels about 1/2 the speed of the true PS3 remote. I spent hours attempting every combination of delay and transmit settings in the Logitech software but could configure it to produce equivalent performance. So I've chosen to disable this adapter and go back to my PS3 remote. Now everything is controlled by the 1100...except for the PS3 (by choice).
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works with RF. With the Monster remote, too
customer_reviews.text: All of my electronics are in a closet, so I need an RF remote. After going through several POS Harmonies, I settled on the Monster AVL-300 (which uses the Harmony software but is much sturdier). When I bought this PS3 adapter, I needed to know two things: 1. Does it support RF? The instructions say to put this adapter in the remote's line of sight, which isn't what I want. 2. Does it work with the Monster remote? I'm happy to report that the answer to both questions is "yes." I put this Harmony PS3 adapter next to the Monster extender in the closet, and it worked right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: vs

customer_reviews.title: Dead solid perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, right out of the box, and has since day one. Our PS3 is finally a full member of our AV system family, no longer bastardized by it's inability to respond to our Harmony remote, and no longer resented for requiring the placement of a dual shock on the coffee table. Set up was perfect and instant - works right, works every time - could not be better. Unobtrusive on the shelf between the BD and the PS3 - black IS the new black, after all. Would have gone 6 stars if the price was a leeeeetle lower, but that's true of everything I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one, as the first was fried from a lightning ground strike. It works well and I never have had an issue with it. My complaints: - Pricey for what it is - Requires IR. For the price, it should have a direct RF input for the Harmony remotes. My whole setup is hidden away and ran RF; I shouldn't need to use an IR blaster for this but it is required. It IS a Logitech product after all, so RF integration should be pretty straight forward with the Harmony RF remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Nitrousbird

customer_reviews.title: Good, but why so much?
customer_reviews.text: This thing works very well, on the first try. All I did was go to my Play Station 3 settings and just clicked on add remote. Pushed the connect button on the device and now my Harmony Remote works with my PS3. It's really cool and easy to set up. My only problem is the price for the product. I paid for it, so I guess I shouldn't complain to much but it only allows you to control the PS3 where as you would have to still use the old remote. It should cost less than $50.00 dollars. It does it's job, and it does it well. Easy to set up and easy to use. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharpless

customer_reviews.title: works good. could be better
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as promised. However, there is one glitch. If you try to let PS3 turn off automatically after download complete, but you still want to turn of the monitor and speakers, there is no way you can do it using the remote. There is no easy solution. Also, actually, i, myself, still love to use the controller to control the movie playback. It is easier to locate any button than the Harmony. Esp. after i bought the PS3 quad charger, i never worry about charging the controllers. So, after all, this remote receiver only works as turn on/off the PS3 for me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works but a tad expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother's harmony 650 smart remote and it works flawlessly so far. Will connect and sync right away with almost no need for customizing the buttons. Had to tweak a few for my brother's liking but other than that just sync it to the remote then the remote to the PS3 and its pretty much ready to go. Its bluetooth which means you can put it pretty much anywhere instead of right next to the playstation 3 Only complaint is how expensive it is for what you get. Normally 59.99 and got it on sale for 49.99 and that still just seems a little much for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: KUSOsan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to control my PS3 with my harmony remote. The only thing I found disappointing is that I should have to buy an addon for my harmony to work with my PS3, one that cost half as much as the remote at that. I would think for such an expensive remote, it would natively support the PS3. But I finally broke down and bought it because I got sick of my ps3 controller dying mid movie and not being able to click pause without finding another controller. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: T. Opel

customer_reviews.title: wonderful wish i'd known about this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can control my Setup with one remote. I have been forced to use the PS3 remote which won't control any of my other devices and a semi-universal remote from my receiver to control my tv and receiver. This thing works like a dream. Easy to install and set up. I'm using it with the Harmony 350 which is one of the greatest remotes I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkington Hammerpants III

customer_reviews.title: Finally a fully function Harmont to PS3 interface
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Finally a fully functional interface between the harmony remotes and the PS3. Unlike the Nyko and others, this allows control of every function, including remotely turning the PS3 on and off. Also it will hard wire to a Harmony RF system. Pairing with the PS3 was seamless and quick. When configuring harmony remote, you must delete previous PS3's then add the PS3 again as a device.... click through the set-up and the harmony software automatically assumes you are using this adapter (they don't tell you that part)
customer_reviews.author: Ava's Mom

customer_reviews.title: PS3 Slim
customer_reviews.text: Works with my PS3 slim. Now I don't even need my ps3 controller. I don't think I've played any games on this since God of War. So I can just bury the controller in the cabinet. With the logitech remote, I program the "watch a movie" activity and the PS3 automatically turns on. Then the buttons allow me to move the courser and watch the movie (or go to the playstation store, menus, settings, etc). It does everything the PS3 controller could do. Now I truly have one master remote. Thank you logitech!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Own the Nyko dongle .. This is a hands down victory
customer_reviews.text: As a owner of the Nyko Blu-Wave Infrared Remote ,It was a tough choice to spend $60 just to be able to turn the PS3 on and off. But it was well worth it.. the Nyko had a very noticeable delay from the time you hit the remote(Harmony ONE , Best remote ever)but this has no delay at all .. i took the plunge and i was very impressed ,the Harmony adapter is much smaller then the pics make it look which is great,the only thing i would have changed is the bright LED on top that is always on .. but other then that it is so much better then the Nyko and worth the premium price
customer_reviews.author: Jonthomasdesigns

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought one of these (and a harmony remote) a LONG time ago! No more switching from TV remote to PS3 controller to watch movies! I got my PS3 as a free gift with my TV and it is basically a media hub. I don't even use the controller anymore now that I have a Harmony 670 and this adapter. All functions work OOB after selecting PS3 in the harmony config.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 10signals outta10))))))))))
customer_reviews.text: Quickly, this is better than the ps3 bluetooth remote! I use this with my new Logitech 650. This is way snappier than the original ps3 remote. I read about some cord problems, but this is a 10+rated device add-on for ps3. If you have a more menu driven fancier remote, I'm not sure how that would be better than the original remote though. My 600 and 650 are better with this $20 wonder device.
customer_reviews.author: Movieskinny

customer_reviews.title: NOW I have a universal remote!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived faster than expected! Packing was decent, but I suppose if the mail carrier was not as careful, the packaging could have been crush? Setup was a breeze - just make sure you READ and FOLLOW the instructions! The quick setup guide explains things easily. Simply plug the adapter into an electrical outlet, turn on your PS3, sync the device, and then update your Harmony remote. Only wish the Harmony One would have bluetooh capability built into the device from the start rather than having to purchase an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great item.......until it stops working!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this adapter back in 2010. About 3 months ago the adapter started to act erratically, turning on and off, sometimes working and sometimes it would be dead. Finally about a week ago it just gave out, doesn't work at all at this point. For $50, I would expect something as simple as this piece to last a lot longer than 2 years.... Unfortunately, this is the ONLY solution available at this point....so looks like I'll be purchasing a new one soon. Booooo
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bag O' Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Sort of obsolete, but if you have an older harmony remote, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Logitech came out with a box that has bluetooth and wifi radios as well as IR output to control your whole system via iPad, iPhone or Android phone/tablet. I bought a harmony 1100 remote from a closeout site for $150 before I found out about the new stuff, then had to buy this box to control PS3 for media streaming and disc playback (using the PS3 remotes sucks). I ended up spending about $200 for functionality that can be bought new for $100. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rehorst

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick, but is stupid expensive
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up with no issues whatsoever. Instructions were easy to follow. Product feels very light and almost flimsy. It is a one trick pony. It lets you control functions on the PS3 with a Harmony remote. I use a Harmony one remote, which is also expensive. I'm happy that everything can be controlled from the one remote. I would not have been satisfied without the PS3 in there, so I did it. My wallet is still hurting. No presents for the kids this year.
customer_reviews.author: C. Riess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent add on for any PS3
customer_reviews.text: Device was easy to install, once synced and I reset up my controller, ( A 3-4 minute process ) it was seamless to use my PS3 with my Harmony remote. Now I can navigate my DVD menus's or the video's I download from the Playstation store without handing off one controller for another. Hard to imagine not having it now. Highly recommended for anyone with a PS3 and a Harmony. I did manage to get it on special for 40 bucks, and I had a 25 dollar gift certificate to Amazon so my out of pocket expense was really low, I still would buy it again as long as it was sub 40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott Musial

customer_reviews.title: It's about time
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going into product details since a lot of other reviewers have already done so. What I will state is that this product works flawlessly and it does what it's supposed to do. Many people complain how expensive it is but in my humble opinion, I think it's a small price to pay for convenience. It's extremely satisfying to be able to control your complete home entertainment experience with one control. I had no issues with setting it up. I followed the instructions that were included and it worked with out a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy S

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how easy it was to set up
customer_reviews.text: Wow.....I really thought it was going to take an epic amount of tweaking settings and button pushing to set this thing up with my Logitech Harmony One. It was the easiest thing ever. It was almost plug-and-play. The downside to this is the price. After paying $$ for the remote, now you have to shell out $43 more for the adapter just to use it with your PS3. It's Sony's fault though, not Logitech's. Sony doesn't use IR signals, only Bluetooth. This adapter converts IR signals to Bluetooth. The green light on top is a little too bright but I'll get over it. Regardless, it's definitely worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: NYDrummer429

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth it for a universal remote.
customer_reviews.text: Its a little pricey and I bought it along with a Harmony One. I have a home theater setup and my wife is always confused with the remotes when I change anything. On top of that when parents are visiting they can almost never get to, for example, Netflix on the PS3 when they want to. The universal remote is a god send and this is a must have with the PS3. No more struggling with remotes and I can continue to mess around with my home theater.
customer_reviews.author: ro

customer_reviews.title: gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: if you use the sony ps3 remote or even better, the harmony this product is what you need to get them to communicate. rest assured, it works. It takes a few minutes to set the bluetooth signal and mine is perched on top of my ps3, it is about the size of a man's wallet and it has a green light that stays on. i don't like power adaptors so that takes away from the appeal of the product but it works. minus a star for the price gig, but what else can a poor boy do?
customer_reviews.author: Waicool

customer_reviews.title: PS3 Adapter just works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the harmony remote and the wireless extender. I went through the setup and this works as advertised. It simply takes the PS3 commands from your Harmony remote and converts them to bluetooth which the PS3 understands. The setup was simple. You pair the device with your PS3 and do your remote setup and that's pretty much it. This was the final touch I needed to simplify my setup as my equipment is located in a cabinet and I needed a Harmony so mere mortals could run my AV system.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vigod

customer_reviews.title: Control a PS3 with my Harmony One?  Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this accessory along with my Harmony One, and very glad I did so. I'm now able to control my PS3 without having that extra bluetooth remote lying around. Installation of this was very simple. Plug it in, fire up the PS3, pair the accessory to the PS3 like any other device, and that's it! The device simply takes the IR signal from the Harmony remote and sends the command via bluetooth to the PS3. The cost of the accessory is a bit on the pricey side, but well worth it to me. Great job Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: M. Marinkovich

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup because this PS3 adapter is identified by ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a PS3 and a Harmony remote for all of your AV equipment you need this Logitech PS3 Adapter. You can control all of the PS3 functions with this adapter and your Harmony Remote. Very easy to setup because this PS3 adapter is identified by the PS3 the same way you register a PS3 game controller or PS3 AV remote. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: works ok, but failed after a year
customer_reviews.text: Works well with harmony remote, but unit no longer stays powered on. Requires disconnecting power to reset. Probably some sort of power supply or capacitor issue, but haven't had time to troubleshoot. Not worth the effort of dealing with Logitech support, they are notorious for suckage and with the recent announcement of end of support for the old harmony adapters, will probably replace with Peel and a spare Galaxy tab 2.0.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't much to say about this product other than it does precisely what it says it does. About the only drawback is that it needs to be powered, and appears for all the world to always be on. (And it must be, right? If it is looking for a power signal to turn the PS3 on?) Anyway this thing plus a Harmony One and suddenly my babysitter doesn't need to be left a "cheat sheet" to work our entertainment devices... neither does "grandma." I'm still very happy about this purchase, a month or two after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: Daran Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but died WAY too quickly for how much it costs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2009, and loved it from the moment I got it connected. Using the PS3 as a media center and Blu-Ray/DVD player was no longer a frustrating experience. However, in December of 2011, it just stopped working. No idea what happened, but I went to turn on the PS3 and got nothing. Tried a new power supply hoping it was just a dead PSU. Nothing. Everything in my home theater setup is on a decent surge protector (and nothing else was damaged), so I guess it just burnt out. Pretty frustrating that such a fairly expensive device (for what it does) died so quickly. Definitely my first negative experience with a Harmony (or even Logitech) product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for PS3/Harmony Owners
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition! I have only used it for a few days, and for basic functions but I love being able to put away the extra remote for my entertainment system so far. The fact that you have to plug it in and have another black box under the entertainment center is only a minor inconvenience and the $60 price tag is a bit high, but the overall convenience is worth it. This would have gotten 5/5 stars but the green light that indicates it being on is a bit bright for me, detracting from movie watching or game play while the room is dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Works well, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Basically does what it says. Allows your PS3 to work with your harmony remote. The problem with this device is that the green power LED on this is absurdly bright. There should be a way to either turn it off or down. A piece of electrical tape is how I solved the problem. There is a little confusion setting it up in the harmony remote software. Just add a PS3 to your device list and ignore the warning that the PS3 requires this device. It will program correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ironchefkz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it, opened it up and plugged it in. Turned on my PS3 and synced it to the system. Went into MyHarmony and added the PS3 and synced my Harmony 700. From another review or maybe a forum(I can't remember now) I saw that turning down the delay(I put mine on 100ms) and turning off repeat(set to 0!) would improve performance/response. I did both of these before testing and could not be happier with the results! Now I am TRULY down to one remote!!
customer_reviews.author: RollJordanRoll

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This required no additional setup on my part. It was simply plug and play. It works perfectly and I can't overstate how fantastic it is to not have to use the game controller anymore. I LOVE IT! Yes, it's not bluetooth but it's small enough and the connecting cord is long enough to put it somewhere out from behind a door so you can easily use it. This is a must have accessory for a Logitech Harmony if you have a PlayStation 3!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool, but beware...
customer_reviews.text: This adapter works very well as it is intended, very easy setup, wonderfully reliable. But be aware that the PS|3 can talk to ONLY ONE controller remote. I had purchased the BlueTooth Remote for PS|3 which works quite well, but I wanted to merge it into the Harmony 900 universal remote. This adapter lets me add the PS|3 to the Harmony 900 (and my 700, and my Link), but the PS|3 can no longer talk to the bluetooth remote device. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your going to automate everything with your harmony remote why not your ps3 too.
customer_reviews.text: I know in my house we use the ps3's to play blue rays and stream media from the server so this device was almost a necessity when I got my harmony remote. Now I'm able to control the ps3 just as easy as everything else. This was simple to setup and easy to control using the harmony remote. If you actually use your ps3 and plan to get a Harmony this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Harmony One remote
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little guy several years ago and it's still working today. I don't use it daily but when I do use it I've had good luck with it functioning as needed. I've had to replace my Harmony remote more often than I have this PS3 adapter. The last couple remotes I've used it with have been the Harmony One.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Harmony remote and PS3 owners
customer_reviews.text: Device simply works as advertised, allowing a Harmony remote control to operate a PS3. Eliminates the annoyance of having to have that one extra remote for something as simple as watching movies on the PS3. Easy to set up, low-profile, and great infrared reception (adapter once slipped off the TV stand into a crack between the stand and a subwoofer and STILL worked). Only downside is that the PS3 will only allow one remote device, so it will render your current PS3 remote inoperable to use this adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use our PS3 primarily for the DVD/Blu ray player. It got really old using the PS3 game controllers, especially when it would die and you can't just put in new batteries. Already had a Harmony remote, so adding this was a breeze and really made things easier and more convenient. Highly recommend this. Only downside is the power plug is a small brick and takes up more space on the power strip...
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Flawless connection
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews about this, I noticed a few people complaining about it, but I have so far had no problems with it. Pro's: Easy to install Makes the PS3 into a real entertainment centre Stays connected even after power loss reset easily hidden Con's Price is a little high considering you need to drop min $80 dollars for a logitech remote All in all a great product and a must if you watch alot of movies on your PS3 and want to use one remote!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Morris-page

customer_reviews.title: 99% Perfect - So much better than the Radio Shack makeshift rig
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very easy to setup. I had the old Radio Shack adapter and PS2 remote (imported from China) hooked up for years - which worked with the most basic commands. I was glad to see this come out - although it's a little on the expensive side. My only complaint is that my bluetooth PS3 remote no longer works; since only one remote can be paired at a time. Currently I have this working with my Harmony 1000 and Harmony 890 remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kid

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could control all of my devices with my harmony One remote. It works better than I hoped. All of the PS3 remote functions are now possible with my Harmony Remote. It was very simple to set up. All I did was plug it in, turn on the PS3 and go to the "Accessories" section. Then I selected "Bluetooth Remote" and pushed the red "pairing" button on the bottom of the Harmony Adapter. The PS3 immediately recognized and paired with the adapter. Now I really only need one remote! I should have purchased this thing two years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Filling a missing feature
customer_reviews.text: This adapter fills a glaring hole left by Sony. This is the accessory that allows a user to control the PS3 with a Harmony remote. As with all Harmony products, this simply works as advertised. I was pleasantly surprised by how small this unit is. The shiny black hue camouflages the unit so it's nearly hidden in the tv cabinet. I find it amusing that this is an accessory for an accessory, but it definitely fills a need. Definitely worth the $40 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: YeeDiddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. installation was fast, simple, and trouble-free. We watch a lot of Blu-Ray discs, and being able to control the PS3 with our Harmony remote finally let us get down to one remote for our entire entertainment system, which made my wife a very happy person. Don't know why Logitech discontinued this product, but all the convenience it provides for the price makes it a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Reich Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Logitech Harmony remotes.
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to use my Logitech Harmony ONE remote to control blu ray playback on my PS3 as well as other functions. Makes life with my PS3 so much simpler. On/off and all playback, cursor and PS controller functions are available on my Harmony ONE. Great Adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Toshiro S.

customer_reviews.title: This Item works great with Harmony 880 or Harmony One
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as soon as I knew it was available. I had a Harmony 880 remote and wanted full control of my PS3 for watching movies, including shutting it off when done. In the mean time I had ordered a Harmony One remote. When it arrived I set it up to work woth my 880 and it worked flawlessly as well. When my Harmony One arrived I updated it and it never skipped a beat. It is well worth the money to have full control when watching movies from your main remote.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Finally use your Logitech remote with PS3 (but shouldn't the remote already be compatible?)
customer_reviews.text: Okay...you dish out $300 plus for a universal remote that controls almost everything except your PS3 and you have to dish out $50 more to control it with this extra device? Well, it doesn't make much sense but that's exactly what you have to do. It works well but why didn't Logitech already have PS3 compatibility in the 1st place in there Harmony 1100? Why not have bluetooth capability already built in a $300+ remote? Not cool Logitech :(
customer_reviews.author: Rick I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. No longer need the controller when I want ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. No longer need the controller when I want to watch Netflix or a bluray. I had the old dongle, but it didn’t allow the ps function. I am embarrassed how exasperated I got when I would have to get my butt up off the couch to get the other controller, but now I no longer have to feel that shame!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech PS3 Adapter
customer_reviews.text: This works great with my Harmony H659 universal remote! Now I only need one remote to power up my home theater. Set up was easy and the adapter is so small that you hardly notice that it's there. The 1st one I got was bad and didn't work...I emailed Amazon...no problem...sent it back and got another one which worked..kudos to Amazon! They even sent me a shipping return label which was unexpected. Great product...great service.
customer_reviews.author: RustyTrombone

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product worked flawlessly with my Harmony 890 remote. I had been using an IR receiver plugged into my PS3's USB port, but this was a great upgrade to gain full control over my PS3. All I had to do was delete my old PS3 device, add it again, and use it. It included all the programming necessary to even power-down the PS3 with one click. Definitely the best IR to bluetooth converter for those with a Harmony remote, and at a resonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to (at least it used to)
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to. Great convenience for the PS3, especially powering on and off. The only drawback is the price which is pretty steep for what it does. Edit: The product stopped working a couple months after the one year warranty period. It shuts off regularly and requires an un-plug and re-plug. That is pretty inconvenient since I don't control movies with my remote very regularly. It is pretty close to useless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Drawring Simon

customer_reviews.title: Should you or shouldn't you....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband for father's day....I gave it to him early, as I am like my kids and can't keep a secret. My husband set it up...it worked for 5 minutes and died. I don't know if I got a bad adapter or if this has happened in the past...I love Logitech products we use them all over our home. So I'm hoping it was a one time deal. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: ynona74

customer_reviews.title: Fails Soon
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit, after the first one failed. It failed after only about a year. When the new one came neither the old adapter nor the old unit worked with the new parts. Some reviews say the old adapter was under-powered. The new one has a bigger adapter. I only hope this one survives beyond a year. The unit did a good job when it worked, hence one extra star more than the bare minimum.
customer_reviews.author: DIYMo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to say that the other reviewers have not stated. Yes, it is expensive. Yes, it allows you to use a single remote for your entire AV setup. Yes, it is very easy to setup. I personally love it. Keep in mind that you cannot use this remote in conjunction with the PS3 remote (not sure why you would want to). After I paired the harmony adapter my PS3 remote stopped working. It looks like both the Harmony Adapter and the PS3 remote is always in slot 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just received this unit today and got it setup in about 5 minutes. Everything works great. The only downside I ran into was that once this unit is paired with the PS3 as a remote, my original PS3 bluetooth remote no longer worked. Apparently you cannot have 2 bluetooth remotes paired with the PS3 at the same time. Thats a PS3 problem though and nothing wrong with this wonderful unit. What a welcome addition to Logitechs line.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Mint! Set up is as easy as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is MINT! Paired with my Logitech 650 remote for my bedroom and now one remote does it all. This thing literally only took 3 minutes to setup. Take it out, plug it in and go to the PS3 accessories page to pair remote and then click the button on bottom of the adapter and you are in business. I just hope it lasts a few years at least and if it does than it's 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DK1980

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Logitech programed in all the codes into their DB for the ps3. This lets the ps3 get those controls. It has an IR receiver to get signals from either the remote or from an IR blaster from the RF remote extender. If you're using a remote extender you can just get a mono 2.5mm cable (possibly a 3.5mm mono cable with a mono adapter) plug the remote extender directly into the harmony ps3 adaptor and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Gelnett

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 years and can say it works very well. I have all my audio equipment hidden behind a wall and purchased this to ensure the PS3 controls would work. I guess the highest compliment I can give it is that I have never thought about it in the time I have been using it. Set up takes about 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Helios999

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything it says it does. My only complaint is the strange (but necessary) routine it goes through while turning off my PS3. Since Sony wants to verify if we REALLY want to turn off their unit the Harmony remote has to include extra steps. Be sure and keep it aimed at your equipment for at least 10 seconds or so. Other than that, this adapter keeps my coffee table with only one remote on top.
customer_reviews.author: Whitt P

customer_reviews.title: Done in less than 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has made an amazing product here. It took me less than 60 seconds to get it working. In fact it took longer to unpack! Setup is a breeze, unpack the item, plug it in ( AC) and pair it with the PS3. Once paired, plug in your harmony remote and program via the web interface and you are done. I was fortunate to get the item on sale through amazon, but regardless of price, if you want to use your harmony alone then invest in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money, works great !!!!! .... doesnt work with PS4 yet, but i believe it will soon
customer_reviews.text: This converter works great and required no additional setup besides plugging it in and registering it as a bluetooth device on your PS3. I use a harmony 700 remote and it works better then my $20 sony PS3 bluetooth remote..... it doesnt control my PS4 yet, but i believe it will soon ...... actually i cant find any PS4 remote yet, and you cant even register a blutooth device on it yet, so i think theyre still working on it and will have all that available soon ....... the program for the harmony remote has a PS4 icon and will switch all your inputs to your PS4,
customer_reviews.author: jim fortenbury

customer_reviews.title: This product is so great that you will forget that it is there
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great that you will forget that it is there. Once you set it up with your universal remote, your PS3 is now just controlled by your remote, and you really never think about it again. Great for watching blu-rays and streaming services. Free yourself from using your PS3 controllers with a device that can also manipulate your TV and receiver.
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that solves a problem that at first seems improbable to solve. My Harmony remote only puts out RF. My PS3 only accepts Bluetooth input. I'd basically resigned myself to adding a second remote to my setup. When I discovered this, I thought for sure it would connect through USB, leaving that ugly dongle hanging out the front, and permanently taking that slot. The use of RF and Bluetooth is terribly clever and requires minimal setup. It also allows you to keep your PS3 outside line of sight (even in a cabinet!). If you've got a Harmony remote and a PS3, this product is a no-brainer. Kudos to Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Derik DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Great, wish I didn't need it
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected, but a little disappointed that it's required at all. Wish bluetooth was just supported on the remote. Not much else to say. There is a green light that's pretty bright on this thing, so if it bothers you, something to think about. You can't exactly hide it, as it needs to be in line of sight to remote for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. At first I had trouble with it, then I read the directions (doh!). I hated using the PS3 game controller for video control. The game controller is over-sensitive and jumps randomly from function to function, and is really sensitive to bumps and vibrations. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sabatke

customer_reviews.title: The final piece in the puzzle for world domination.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to controll the PS3. All the movie functions. It is even better than the Sony remote controller (because I can now controll everything with the Logiteck 650) and it is light years better than using the controller for movie viewing. My wife is ~finally~ happy that I have one controller that controls EVERYTHING in our Media room.
customer_reviews.author: 0Canada

customer_reviews.title: Great for PS3
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several weeks, and it really has worked flawlessly with my Harmony One. There is a slight delay when pausing a movie or restarting, but it's no longer than the delay I had with the PS3 remote. Set up is easy and straightforward. If this were destroyed in a flood or some other natural disaster, I would definitely get a new one. If it broke on it's own, I would probably have to rethink the 5-star rating, but would still probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Goudelock

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Sony
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. It does what its supposed to and nothing more. My complaint is with Sony. They want you to buy "Their" remote, so that you add another to the collection. I wanted to be able to program my current remote a Logitech Harmony to be able to control my PS3 and not have to spend the extra money. To say nothing of having another remote sitting around that I have to feed batteries to.
customer_reviews.author: John Greene

customer_reviews.title: Harmony PS3 Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this adapter. I bought the Harmony universal remote a few years ago because I hated having more than one remote to control all of my components. When I learned that there was an adapter that would do that for my PS3 I couldn't pass it up. After some basic configuration, my Harmony One can now do everything my PS3 remote can do.Now I am back to one remote again. This remote works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for full PS3, Bluetooth-based control
customer_reviews.text: See my comment above, this is my review. This device is hands down the best way to get IR to Bluetooth compatibility for your Harmony and PS3. It is BY FAR the least expensive way to do it, with other IR to BT adapters going for nearly $100. The Nyko adapter works, kinda. First off, I hate that it stuck out of the front ruining the experience, secondly when used with a Logitech Harmony it would often send multiple button presses for one press on the Harmony. This is the answer, and it's natively supported by the Harmony. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Working great, and loving it.
customer_reviews.text: This is working great for my PS3 and Harmony remote. I can now completely turn off the playstation with the click of the off button. I have had this for years now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device - Functions exactly as specified
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases I've made in a while. It functions just as it says it does, allowing your remote to perfectly mimic the PS3 official bluetooth remote. One thing to be aware of, though, (and I'm not sure if this is due to my Logitech Harmony One or the PS3 adapter) is that a few commands take a bit longer than expected to carry out. Basically, when I'm ready to turn my entertainment center off, the PS3 is the last device to go, and it takes quite a few seconds for it to power off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Works great but had one "kick off"
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month now and it works great. About a week after getting it I had an instance where all of the controllers and this unit had to be re-paired with the PS3. In other reviews this seems to have happened more often but only once for me so far. In the three weeks since then it's been fine. For me it's well worth the extra cost compared to a Nyco remote to be able to power up and turn off my PS3 from my remote.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Gayan

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Logitech did what Sony refused to do - make the PS3 usable as a dvd player. Installation is easy. Plug it in and establish a bluetooth connection w/your PS3. Setup using the Logitech Harmony Remote software is easy, but not as clear as I thought it would be. If you have never added the PS3 as a device then just add it and your done. If you already had it added then remove it and re-add the device and your done. You do NOT add the Harmony adapter as a device. It's as simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: Super T

customer_reviews.title: Why is there not an RF receiver in a $500 machine?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: First off the Logitech Harmony adapter while expensive works beautifully with the PS3. I wish this would have been available at launch and only makes me wonder why Sony didn't build an RF receiver into the PS3 to begin with. Instead we are forced to buy a $60 adapter to convert to the native bluetooth. Oh well for the cost of one game I am now able to use my one remote to control them all. Precious!
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: For the tech nerd in all of us
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Harmony remote and a PS3, then you'll want to have this little guy around. Despite what some other reivews said, I found the setup to be quick and easy. Most of us that are playing with the settings with our Harmony remotes wouldn't have a problem finding an excuse to go into the setup software anyway! Yes, the BT Sony remote is only $20, but that defeats the purpose of a Harmony remote! The goal here is ONLY 1 remote and this adapter does it!
customer_reviews.author: Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a Harmony One remote and wanted to take full advantage of it to control my PS3 along with the rest of the components in my system. The Logitech Harmony Adapter worked exactly as expected. It's easy to setup and is very low-profile. It's a bit pricey for the type of product that it is, but it's an indispensable unit for the Harmony remote and PS3.
customer_reviews.author: CLop

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do - lets me control the PS3 with a Logitech Harmony universal remote. Downside is that the PS3 only allows for on BD remote, so if you already have a BlueRay/DVD remote paired, adding this will disable the other remote. Not Logitech's fault by any means!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Snap to install, not sure on the usefulness
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be great, except my Logitech Remote (which is the Xbox 360 version) won't allow it to work in conjunction with my TV, so I manually have to go to Devices>PS3>then scroll through it to do any of the commands. Not just Choose Play PS3 So it will turn the PS3 on, then turn on the TV, then the surround sound. I have to turn the PS3 on separately. Otherwise, works as advertised. and it was super easy to pair with my ps3
customer_reviews.author: M. C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes controlling a PS3 easy!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter makes it easy to control your PS3 with your Harmony remote. Setup is simple, easy, and straight-forward. Just follow the instructions and it's a snap. After the one-time setup is complete, it is super easy and intuitive to use. Now I can turn on/off my PS3 to use it for Netflix streaming without having to grab a different remote or a controller. If you have a harmony remote, and a PS3, I highly recommend getting one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Oreoflow

customer_reviews.title: The Missing Link for PS3 Owners
customer_reviews.text: This unit performs precisely as indicated. With this piece, your Logitech remote completely replaces the PS3 remote you may have purchased separately. It does not consume a USB port on the PS3 which is of some consolation to those with PS3 units with a smaller number of USB ports. If you have a PS3 and are hesitant about a Logitech remote and this unit, rest assured that the two devices work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: F. McGee

customer_reviews.title: I wondered why I hadn't bought it before!
customer_reviews.text: If you watch Amazon movies using your play station this is a no brainer. I am a Prime member so I have access to a lot of free TV. I don't have any of the TV tech out there, just a PS 3. Every time I wanted to watch a Netflix or Amazon movie, I had to use the PS control to play, rewind, search, etc. which is a real pain!
customer_reviews.author: Diverboston

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I use a PS3 as a media center in our living room and i already have a Harmony remote. The problem was that the Harmony remote uses IR and the PS3 uses bluetooth. This little guy solves that problem by bridging the gap between the two. Works great and now my Harmony remote can control the PS3 too.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: There's only so much you can say about a product like this. It either works or it doesn't. This adapter performs as advertised. The ONLY reason I give it two stars is because I spent nearly two hundred dollars for a Harmony remote and this "optional" adapter was required for the remote to control the PS3, one of the most popular BluRay players on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Plug it into power and in three easy steps on your PS3 your Harmony remote controls the PlayStation 3. It's either the remote or the transmiter but there can be a second or so delay from when you push a button on the remote and the action actually takes place. Some times a single press is registered as having been pressed multiple times. But don't get me wrong. A single remote that correctly controls my TV, Cable Box, AV Reciever (sound system), and PS3... best accessory buy for the PS3 yet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Byerwulf

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in and worked great with my CECHA01 PS3
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in and worked great with my CECHA01 PS3. I had tried one of these a few years ago and it wouldn't work with my PS3 for some reason. So they have obviously changed something because it connected right up no problems. Finally I can use my Harmony remote with my PS3 for movies.
customer_reviews.author: mdan575

customer_reviews.title: Logitech PS3 Infrared Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a PS3 when my Xbox bit the dust but didn't realize that my Harmony XBOX remote wouldn't work with the PS3 (which uses Bluetooth). I bought the Harmony PS3 adapter and have been very pleased. Installation was a snap and I can now control the PS3 with my harmony remote using the infrared adapter. I'm back to having 1 remote for all my devices... just like it should be..
customer_reviews.author: Iainsmith

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a Harmony Remote a while back to drive everything: TV, AVR, Comcast, etc.. Works great out of the box except for it does not work with the PS3 (we use this as our primary Blue-Ray deck) out of the box. You need this adapter. It was easy to set up and now we can drive everything with a single remote - AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Took less than five minutes to get it set up and it works perfectly with my Harmony 300i. Turning the PS3 off is interesting though because it uses a macro (button sequence) to hit the PS button, go all the way down, back up one, and then select power the system off. As long as Sony doesn't change the order of that menu, the power off feature should work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very good; when it stays connected
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is very good while it is connected. Unfortunately it often disconnects on it's own and you have to go back into the Ps3 menu and re-connect. Other than that, it does a nice job with the Harmony remotes. It is probably the best option out there to link the Harmony to the PS3; however. Take the good with the bad, I guess?
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for Harmony / PS3 owners
customer_reviews.text: I picked one of these up quite a while ago, and haven't regretted it since. Works nearly PERFECTLY with my Harmony 880 and PS3. On the rare occasion it refuses to turn the PS3 on, but tha's a VERY rare occassion. I highly recommend this to anyone w/ a Harmony and a PS3. Allows seamless interaction with your home theater, and I consider this a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: This add on is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have a Logitech 700 remote that operates everything in my home system flawlessly. The only thing missing was the PS3. This little add on (very small foot print) provides the missing link. It installed quite easily and works all my PS3 functions, mainly watching dvd's. The only downside is that it disables the secondary dvd remote I purchased as the PS3 will only connect one bluetooth remote. The game controller's still work fine. All in all this was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: We Myones

customer_reviews.title: Was it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: The ps3 adapter actually works very well unlike my Logitech 900 remote that controls it. After purchasing it I realized there is no real purpose to have it except to watch DVD contact. It allows you to use a lighted remote instead of the the useless ps3 Bluetooth remote. Sooooo, for me it was worth purchasing to have a better PS3 remote.
customer_reviews.author: Cancerman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic way to integrate playstation into Harmony Remotes
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this. Its been a pain because i could not unify the remote with the Harmony setup at home given the bluetooth. Apparently Logitech got the message. I hooked it up and its flawless and no extra device to setup. You link it in the settings of your PS3 and you are done. No more using remote for sound and controller for PS3 video. Get it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PeterD
